campaign_bonus_value_ids_agent.notes: Percentage modifier to agent action cost. Negative reduces cost. Used at character bonuses.
Modify agent authority attribute level. Used at character bonuses.
Modify agent subterfuge attribute level. Used at character bonuses.
Modify agent zeal attribute level. Used at character bonuses.
Flag value to set if an agent type is recruitable in a region. Used at province bonuses.
Cap for number of agents allowed, used at faction bonuses. Note that total cap is clamped to the faction cap specified in the agent record.
Affects all actions. Percentage modifier to critical failure chance of an agent possessing the effect. Used at character bonuses.
Affects all actions. Percentage modifier to critical failure chance of an agent acting against the character possessing the effect. Used at character bonuses.
Percentage modifier to critical success chance, positive increases chance, used at character bonuses.
Affects all actions. Percentage modifier to critical success chance of an agent acting against the character possessing the effect. Used at character bonuses.
Percentage modifier to opportune failure chance, positive increases chance, used at character bonuses.
Affects all actions. Percentage modifier to opportune failure chance of an agent acting against the character possessing the effect. Used at character bonuses.
Percentage modifier to agent recruitment cost. Negative value decreases cost. Used at province bonuses.
Sets the level of the agent type upon recruitment in this province. Does not stack but uses highest value in province.
Percentage modifier for agent success chance, positive increases chances (which are then clamped to maximum of typically 95%). Used with character bonuses.
Affects all actions. Percentage modifier to success chance of an agent acting against the character possessing the effect. Used at character bonuses
